item.description:
Questionnairey is brought to you by the same people who run Stump Trivia. I always feel a little beat up after stump given my trivia isn't that great so thought this would be a good change.

What is it:
-We pass out a questionnaire at the beginning of the game for players to fill out, bring it up to the host and those answers will be used at a later date.
-We ask a survey question, “Name a famous beach on the East Coast of the United States”
-Have your team guess an answer that you think is the #1 answer. Daytona Beach, Myrtle Beach, Jersey Shore, etc. Bring your answer up to the QJ (Questionnairey Jockey) you will have 2-3 minutes to bring up your answer.
-If you guess the #1 answer it is worth 5 points, the #2 answer 4 points…etc. Only the top 5 answers will get points.
-This continues for a couple of hours and then the bar or restaurant will give away some gift certificates.


http://stumptrivia.com/about
item.name: Questionnairey
